attributes.action: Referendum for the United Kingdom  ( Listen-up MPs )
attributes.additional_details:
The United Kingdom in special circumstances should solve very important and individual matters.
  For Instance, today Edwina curry spoke on Radio 5 about this e-petition idea. She wasn't very
impressed with the idea. She then destroyed her own argument by saying with the capital punishment
matter, she voted for it the first time, whereas the second time she voted against. She said that people
like me rather then sending my thoughts and running them passed your good selves. I should go
and see my MP and He or She would tell me how  they would vote. (((((((((   NO  ))))))))))
In some circumstances the United Kingdom Citizens should take ownership for hard decisions
i.e.;  Capital punishment , Europe, Abortion, Immigration etc. Once the vote has been carried
out and the decision has been made, all the country should act as a whole and make that decision work.


( Captain Common Sense )
